info.name: Apple-Design Theme
info.summary: A modern, Apple-inspired theme for Nextcloud
info.description:
This theme modernizes the Nextcloud interface with an elegant, Apple-inspired design featuring: - Minimalist UI with clean structure and whitespace - Glass morphism and subtle transparency effects - Smooth animations and transitions - macOS/iOS style buttons, cards, and UI elements - Automatic dark mode that respects system preferences - Soft shadows and rounded corners - Enhanced typography and improved spacing
The theme preserves all Nextcloud functionality while providing a modern, elegant look and feel.
info.author: Apple-Design Theme Developer
